item.title: How can i make mods/admins log into the server [READ!]
item.dc:creator: @montalvom montalvom
item.description:
@montalvom wrote:

Ok this is what i mean. I added this code that only lets a certain # of people on. I want to make it so admins/mods can log in even tho the # of max ppl is reached. Please help me do so. This is the code:

if(PlayerHandler.playerCount > 13) { returnCode = 7; savefile = false; disconnected = true; }[br][size=1]Posted on: August 06, 2007, 08:45:23 AM[/size][hr]can anyone help me i was thinking of adding this but i get errors any help??

else if (playerRights >= 2) { disconnected = false;
